channel.title: Img & Rights
channel.description:
When people talk on my server its the wrong Image Crown for their rights. Example when mods talk in my server it shows a donator symbol. Where can I edit this ? Thanks!
I got a Project Insanity! Source = http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556727.0.html

item.title: Img & Rights
item.dc:creator: @The_Moparian The Moparian
item.description:
@The_Moparian wrote:

[IMG1] is the moderator crown I believe. [IMG2] is the admin crown I believe. If not, subtract one from each. I’m not very familiar with that source, but it will most likely be found in your chat config file. That or player.java.

Read full topic
